text:
New paper 🚨! Led by @hmctaggart_c, we conducted #qualitativeresearch with #cancer survivors to get their perspectives on #cannabis use for symptom management.

Co-Authors: @ColeneBentley, @RKMetcalfe, Hawley, @StuartJPeacock
